2. **Killing Eve** (BBC America): A spy thriller with a cat-and-mouse game between an assassin and an MI6 agent, featuring complex characters and intricate plotting.
3. **Peaky Blinders** (BBC Two): A historical crime drama with a strong focus on character development, plot twists, and atmospheric tension.
